starters.name: Vile Trident
starters.description: For any attack this Hero makes, he may take 1 Damnation to roll +1 die.

starters.name: Grimbolt
starters.description: If this deals any Wounds, this Hero may take 2 Damnation to deal 1 additional Wound.

starters.name: Lifebound
starters.description: Each Hit heals 1 Wound from this Hero or from one Ally Close to the target.

level-1.name: Tainted Bow
level-1.description: This Hero may take 1 Damnation to roll +1 die for this attack.

level-1.name: Angelic Ring
level-1.description: +1 die to one Attack card.

level-1.name: Drive Thru
level-1.description: Your Lance and Exotic attacks may target an additional Enemy Close to this Hero.

level-1.name: Dammit Blast
level-1.description: If this rolls any Hits when attacking a Hero, the target gets 1 Damnation.

level-1.name: Healing Bracer
level-1.description: Each Wound dealt by the boosted Melee Attack heals 1 wound from this Hero.

level-1.name: Fancy Blade
level-1.description: +1 reroll and +1 defense

level-1.name: Crusader Shot
level-1.description: Your Bow and Thrown Weapon attacks roll +1 die if the target Hero has any Damnation.

level-1.name: Searing
level-1.description: If this rolls any Hits against a Hero, Saves scored by the defense roll count as Wounds against him instead.

level-1.name: Angelic Ring
level-1.description: +1 die to one Attack card.

level-1.name: Hellborn
level-1.description: To use this, the Hero takes 1 Damnation. If this deals any Wounds, your target is Dazed.

level-1.name: Cloven Hoof
level-1.description: +1 reroll, +1 health, At the start of his activation, this Hero may take 1 Damnation to heal 1 Wound.

level-1.name: Infernal Shield
level-1.description: +1 defense, This Hero may take 1 Damnation to roll an extra Defense die.
